articles.title: Fallback: Welcome to your news widget!
articles.description: This is fallback content. If you see this, the live news function may be configuring.
articles.content: This is fallback content. If you see this, the live news function may be configuring.

articles.title: Please check your Netlify environment variables.
articles.description: Make sure GNEWS_API_KEY is set in your Netlify build settings.
articles.content: Make sure GNEWS_API_KEY is set in your Netlify build settings.

articles.title: After setting the API key, redeploy your site.
articles.description: A new deploy is needed to load the key.
articles.content: A new deploy is needed to load the key.
